article_title: White House press briefing to begin shortly.
sentence: We'll  soon  be  bringing  you  updates  from  the  White  House  press  briefing,  where  we're  expecting  to  hear  more  US  response  on  the  Israeli  air  strike  in  Gaza  that  killed  seven  aid  workers  -  including  one  US-Canadian  dual  citizen.
